Commentary.ab: Y19.10c ⁺āsixšat̰] em. sec. Kellens, 1984 p. 198, n.5. Geldner āsaxṣ̌at̰. Cf. sixša- in VytS7.8 sixšəṇtəm and Y55.6 sixšəmna (ms. 5), səxšəmna (mss. 2030, 2101) and adj. sixšaiia- (Y19.11 sixšaēmca). OInd. śikṣati. ā- irr. augment (Kellens, De Vaan, 2003 p. 65; Bartholomae ā-sak-.
Y19.10c ⁺saš́ąs] em. sec. Kellens (sec. Bartholomae saša-). Geldner saxṣ̌ąs. š́ unattested.

Parallels.ab: vīspō aŋhuš astuuā̊ = VS1.2, VS3.33, VS5.4, VS5.7, VS8.34; ~ Y9.1, VS18.30, VS18.31, YtOhr2.2 (x2), YtOhr2.4 (x2) vīspahe aŋhə̄uš astuuatō; ~ Y19.2, Y19.4, Y57.24, VS18.16, VS18.24, YtSr8.2, YtSrH3.2, ARap2.4, KardeSrošRawan2.2 vīspəm ahūm astuuaṇtəm.
